text: Now You See Me 3 is an upcoming American heist thriller movie. It is expected to be released on November 14, 2025. It was directed by Ruben Fleischer and produced by Bobby Cohen and Alex Kurtzman. It is the third movie in the Now You See Me series and is the sequel to the 2016 movie Now You See Me 2. The cast from the last movies will return to play their characters again. Principle photography for the movie started in July 2024 in Budapest and ended on November 18, 2024. == Cast == ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2025 movies Category:2020s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American heist movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies about con artists Category:Movies directed by Ruben Fleischer Category:Upcoming movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies
title: Now You See Me 3
